entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET September 2022 Updates #235
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-38013: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #234

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Empty http error reason phrase produces messages with empty parens #75570
  • 6.0 CI failure in System.Net.Http: we don't expect to call this after disposing and we don't handle the ODE #75568
    6.0.x
  • Mono llvmaot failing for some HardwareIntrinsics tests #75566
  • [API Proposal]: Deprecate / Hide Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal #75563
  • SPMI runtime tests collection failure: Missing flags on tree #75562
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support IEnumerable Visualizer when debugging on wasm #75552
    8.0.0
  • Improve test coverage for TLS resume #75545
    8.0.0
  • SPMI collection of coreclr R2R and similar tests is failing #75539
    8.0.0
  • Extremely high and unexpected memory commit sizes using DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimit #75538
    Future
  • rc1: Performance regressions in CastingPerf benchmarks #75537
  • net6-android targets - SslStream connectivity issues with self-signed certificates #75536
    8.0.0
  • XmlCustomFormatter is using string.Trim() instead of string.Trim(XmlConverter.WhitespaceChars) #75523
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 34 Regressions on 9/9/2022 1:01:45 PM #75544
  • [armel] Assembler syntax error with gcc, but working with clang #75519
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_Path #75548
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_* #75549
  • Run ServiceController.Start(serviceName) throw exception access is denied #75554
  • [API Proposal]: Add WriteValue(Guid/TimeSpan) in System.Xml.XmlWriter #75515
  • clang-14: unknown argument: '-gcc-toolchain' #75505
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault (SIGSEGV) on LinuxBionic #75502
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #75501
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Calling GetControllingUnknown () generates an assert #75312
    7.0.0
  • The init-vs-env.cmd error message incorrectly states Visual Studio 2019 is required #75556
    8.0.0
  • bugs: System.Int128 operator * and % at overflow #75416
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.IModulusOperators inconsistencies with naming and documentation #75426
  • HostingEnvironmentExtensions.IsDevelopment() etc. seem more strict than necessary #75256
  • [wasm-mt] AOT compilation with threading enabled results in out of bounds memory access #75474
    7.0.0
  • [7.0][garbage collector] Performance issue for non-concurrent server garbage collection #75419
    7.0.0
  • Kestrel TLS handshake fails for every 2nd request when specifying the ClientCertificateMode.AllowCertificate option on Linux with .NET 7 #75079
    7.0.0
  • buiLd runtime C:\WINDOWS was unexpected at this time. #75410
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\Desktop\\boxunboxvaluetype_do\\boxunboxvaluetype_do.cmd #75503
  • Migrating existing working P/Invoke from [DllImport] to [LibraryImport] causes exception at runtime #75052
    8.0.0
  • Android.Device_Emulator.Aot_Llvm - APP_CRASH #75498
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline: All wasm jobs broken with `RuntimeError: Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net7.0` #75398
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange Generic Overload with Unmanaged Type Constraint #75385
    Future
  • Packages inside source build intermediate packages have improper nupkg branding #75290
  • Debug is not working in ASPNET 7.0.100-preview7 when dotnet 6 is installed #74361
    8.0.0
  • Fire a runtime event when ThreadPool is being starved #11008
    Future
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #74066
    8.0.0
  • SemaphoreSlim deadlock in case dispose is called too early #11202
    Future
  • assert in ProcessWaitState on Linux arm64 #74795
    7.0.0
  • ReadOnlySpan<char> overload of Uri.UnescapeDataString #54828
  • ArrayPool<T>.Shared.Return does not check if array already returned #75518
  • Why is `System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata.Id` a `long`? #75476
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalPauseDuration\\GetTotalPauseDuration.cmd #75504
  • superpmi: failure to collect ObjectStackAllocationTests.dll #74968
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Roslyn\\CscBench\\CscBench.cmd #74900
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: test failure collecting b425314.cmd #74969
    8.0.0
  • Quic tests timing out on Linux arm32 #75471
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Assert fat pointers aligned to MinimumFunctionAlignment #75574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Join the special sweep decision #75572
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Simplify and fix the Int128 *, /, and % logic #75567
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] fixing setting a breakpoint in an invalid IL offset after hotreload #75564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] fixing setting a breakpoint in an invalid IL offset after hotreload #75561
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix incorrect scale in genCreateAddrMode + no-opt #75560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression #75559
    NO-MERGE, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing some CI trigger changes #75555
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #75550
    area-codeflow
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Enable TrimMode=full #75547
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToSingle intrinsics for Amd64 #75540
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fixed assembly load check on default config apply #75533
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} (backports #75396) #75531
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{x86,s390x} (backports #75396) #75530
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix build for musl 1.2.3 (backports #67772) #75529
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression #75524
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75163, #75441) #75521
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Run all EAT tests on runtime pipeline #75516
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • enable quic tests on arm32 #75514
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Tests for static inherited members. #75512
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Consolidate System.Private.Xml test projects #75499
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Make ResourceManager.BaseName work as documented. #75497
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75454
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: fix incorrect scale in genCreateAddrMode + no-opt #75433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add armv8l virtualized 32-bit ARM core detection (backports #66477) #75528
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Workaround for building with clang-14 (backports #74696) #75526
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Visual Studio 2019 as required #75558
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify and fix the Int128 *, /, and % logic #75470
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Rename WasmExceptionHandling to WasmEnableExceptionHandling #75543
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0][sgen] Remove two dead fields; fix wasm-mt AOT compilation #75509
    area-GC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.10
  • Publish assets immediately and clean some vars #75222
  • [wasm] Automate patching the emsdk installation to add controlled ind… #75532
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump the macOS image to one that isn't EOL yet #75294
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.10
  • Update OpenSUSE docker image #75534
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add binlog upload to workload generation #75553
    area-Build-mono
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interop… #75438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline errors #75406
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix reference to `Microsoft.Build.NoTargets` #75472
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "[release/7.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring" #75535
  • [release/7.0] Workaround for building with clang-14 #75510
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75508
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] set session ID when TLS resume is enabled #75507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75495
    area-Build-mono
  • Some feedback for 8.0 after doing PR on #75366 for 7.0-rc2. #75379
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • Add well-known OIDs to System.Formats.Asn1 #75485
    tenet-performance, area-System.Formats.Asn1, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reverting change in source generators that require Roslyn 4.4 until we have a VS version with the compiler fix to consume them. #75490
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluate expression on VS #75494
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fix compact unwinding on macOS x64 #75520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add PLT entry index validation mode for MONO_ARCH_CODE_EXEC_ONLY. #75464
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [main][sgen] Remove two dead fields; fix wasm-mt AOT compilation #75511
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • fix exclusions. #75475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: don't try fetching fields of ref classes as SPMI extra queries #75500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't unload MsQuic from the process #75441
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • set session ID when TLS resume is enabled #75435
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • Replace net7 with net8 in dogfooding and workflow docs #75453
    area-Meta
  • [workloads] Bump emscripten dep to use new manifest #75477
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: fix SPMI collection for getStaticFieldCurrentClass #75489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75461
    area-Infrastructure-installer

Updated

  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Implements eager finalization of weak references #75436
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update MsQuic to 2.1.1 #75479
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286

  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602

  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE

    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure

    area-System.IO

    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0

  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

    area-Meta

  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToInt32 intrinsics for Amd64 #75443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

    area-System.Net.Http

  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [APICompat] Document newly added features #27857
    7.0.1xx
  • net6.0-macos publishes a .pkg file #27841
  • MAUI is not compatible with ManagePackageVersionsCentrally #27840
  • SSR with .net6 and angular template #27839

Closed

  • dotnet build parameters (-p) don't work when joined by semicolon (;) in dotnet 6.0.400 #27059
    6.0.401
  • Breaking change in response file parsing #26026
    6.0.305
  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27831
  • Description of `dotnet tool update` is "Update a global tool." even though it supports local tools #27036
    7.0.1xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.2.22452.3] Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime package has mismatched version #27675
  • New project system doesn't copy PDBs from packages #1458
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Try to make all the the trimmer tests happy #27866
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use the portable rid for --use-current-runtime (backports #21748) #27849
    Area-External
  • Make template engine jobs not run in internal build for branches #27842
    Area-Infrastructure, area: dotnet new
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27835
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #27864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Skip publish test that's failing because of a helix image update #27858
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #27853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #27854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #27855
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't hardcode S.C.Immutable version #27830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move forward to 2.20.0 which is the latest release #27770
    Area-Infrastructure
  • changed list command example #27795
    area: dotnet new
  • Merge resolver retargeting to rc2 #27777
  • Improvements to dotnet tool search help text #27832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27773
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.402

Updated

  • Mysterious PR you should ignore for now #27798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1992003 #27789
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1991983 #27667
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [23250] - dotnet test boolean flags options fixed #27262
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Move C# 11 speclets to sub-folder #6451

Updated

  • Update diagnostics for scoped mismatches across overrides, implementations, and delegate conversions #6448
  • Separate return scopes #6450

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `fixed` buffer index access false type with semantic model analysis #63993
  • Breaking change around contextual keyword `scoped` #63986
  • Desktop ErrorsDuringMethodBodyEditing is flaky #63982
  • NetCore.ErrorsDuringMethodBodyEditing is flaky #63981
  • Problem with "potential fix" suggestions being not displayed #63974
    17.4
  • Deprecate `Microsoft.Net.Compilers` on NuGet #63973
  • 'Frozen Partial' semantics need to be reconciled with OOP and SourceGEnerators #63968

Closed

  • Add an overload of `CSharpSyntaxTree.Create` that allows to specify checksum algorithm #62923
    C# 12.0
  • PdbWriter.SerializeDebugInfo() drops extern aliases if the first method is a synthesized method #63927
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32912.209 #63967

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1992025 #63994
  • Change the container of Inheritance margin #63992
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
  • Add theming service and VS implementation #63990
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify deserialization of SerializableSourceTexts #63989
    Area-IDE
  • Require diagnostics to have a location and for that location to have a filepath. #63988
    Area-IDE
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE
  • Don't request frozen partial document for semantic tokens in proc #63984
    Area-IDE
  • Cache results of reading SOurceText in SerializableSourceText #63980
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common patch #63978
    Area-Compilers
  • Update Csc.cs #63976
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Report CS0721 on parameter type #63975
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Skip a flaky test #63983
    Area-IDE, Next
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Simplify adjustment of spans #63969
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63979
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add feature flag for convert to record #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Do not serialize extern aliases to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add a test #63753
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63970
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused param #63966
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify data model for task list #63963
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63965
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use ScopedTypeSyntax in LocalDeclarationStatementSyntax #63962
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #63998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63997
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63996
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify project cache cleanup #63995
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948

  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616

  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Fix Equals override for CompilerDiagnostic reported by CompilerDiagnosticAnalyzer #63937
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942

  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771

  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735

  • Ban api #62921

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Maui Apps Getting Stuck On Android Devices #10104
  • XmlReader performance #10103

  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented behaves different to Xamarin 5 #10101
  • Setting/changing bindable property tied to xaml just before navigating back to previous page results in app crash with error System.InvalidOperationException: View is Missing Handler #10100
  • Toggle button OnColor for Off state not working in iOS, also VisualStateManager is also not working. #10099
    Backlog
  • Add SwipeView behavior to Reveal and Execute in chain #10096
    Backlog
  • Close, minimize, and maximize don't work #10089
  • Childrens of the StackLayout layouts overlaps above on page title by default and above on window while resizing the window. #10087
    Backlog
  • Android emulator unable to call local web api via 10.0.2.2 via http or https - stuck after hours of trying #10086
  • Can't run iOS simulator, in spite of being successfully connected to Mac. #10085
  • await Shell.Current.GoToAsync(sPageName) results in An unhandled win32 exception occurred in [41992] #10084

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid app started freezing/being unresponsive with latest Android WebView #10002
  • Initial Launch of Shell, the FlyoutIsPresented doesn't work code-behind until user taps it #10037
  • Adding an .svg to the Resources/Images folder in a Maui project issue #10082
  • Destroying event is not fired on Android #10091
  • Connectivity implementation not thread-safe on Windows, returning incorrect network status #9972
    Backlog
  • Adding an Entitlements.plist breaks the iOS project #3715
    Backlog
  • [Win/Entry-Editor] MaxLength property is not respected when you assign text from code #7939
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Cannot hot reload Shell styles #2761

PullRequests

Created

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞

  • Fix layout and safe area on FlyoutPage #10083
    area/layout 🔲

Merged

  • Fix SpecialFolder.Personal usages #10098
  • [Windows] Fix COMException using Connectivity class #10062
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028

  • [Windows] Fix Border clipping issue #10061
